description: This file defines a Button component for a Lightning JS application. It creates a focusable rectangle with a text label, initializes its properties based on props, and handles an onEnter event to invoke a callback.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the reactive state of the component, including visual properties and callback functions.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the component's state based on the provided props.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Invokes the callback function when the button receives focus and the enter action is triggered.
